Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Proxy_c

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Proxy_c
All Implemented Interfaces:
Exit, DisconnectedListener, PongListener
public class Proxy_c extends Object implements Exit, PongListener, DisconnectedListener
Proxy_s is client's proxy, it manages connections with server.

  • Method Details

    • first

      public String first()
      Send a message to server to comunicate that client is ready for login. Server answers with the action tha client have to do. It depends on what the player number is.
      Specified by:
      first in interface Exit
      Returns:
      String which corresponds to the actions.

    • setupGame

      public boolean setupGame(int numberOfPlayers, String expertMode)
      It sends to server number of player and expert mode.
      Specified by:
      setupGame in interface Exit
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - is the number of players chosen.
      expertMode - Y for expert mode or N for normal game.
      Returns:
      true if server accepts the message.

      public boolean useSpecial(int special, ArrayList<Integer> color1, ArrayList<Integer> color2)
